questions.question_text:
The administrator at Cloud Kicks has created an approval process for time off requests.
Which two automated actions are available to be added as part of the approval process? (Choose two.)
When users log in to Salesforce via the user interface, which two settings does the system check for authentication? (Choose two.)

choices.D: The user’s Two-Factor Authentication for User Interface Logins permission
choices.C: The user’s Two-Factor Authentication for API Logins permission
choices.B: The user’s profile login hours restrictions

discussion.content:
B and D
B. The user’s profile login hours restrictions: Ensures that the user is logging in during the hours allowed by their profile settings.
D. The user’s Two-Factor Authentication for User Interface Logins permission: Verifies whether two-factor authentication is required for the user’s login via the user interface.

choices.A: Set the Default External Access to Private.

questions.question_text:
The Human Resources department at Northern Trail Outfitters wants employees to provide feedback about their managers using a custom object in Salesforce. It is important that managers are unable to see the feedback records from their staff.
How should an administrator configure the custom object to meet this requirement?

choices.C: Download the last six months of user login data.
choices.D: Turn on Event Monitoring to track user events.
choices.B: Change the Organization-Wide Default to private to restrict visibility.
choices.A: Run a Health Check to identify vulnerabilities.

questions.question_text:
The IT manager at Universal Containers is doing an audit of the system’s security.
How should the administrator provide a summary of the org’s security health?

choices.A: Create a report that shows any Showing Dates not scheduled in the current year to be updated.
choices.B: Sync the users’ Showing Calendar to Salesforce and filter it to only look at this year.
choices.D: Create a validation rule that ensures Showing Date contains a date within the current year.
choices.C: Add Help Text so the user knows to only add a Showing Date within the current year.

questions.question_text:
DreamHouse Realty requires that house showings be scheduled within the current year to prevent too many future showings from stacking up.
How can they make sure Showing Date is only populated with a date this year?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the correct one
